name: 가지장아찌
image: images/가지장아찌.jpg (이미지 파일은 images 폴더에 저장해 주세요. jpg 형식도 가능합니다.)
image_prompt: Here is the recipe for the pickled eggplant. Picture the pickled eggplant made according to this recipe: 1) Cut the eggplant into four pieces and bake in sesame oil. 2) Dip it in the vinegar and garlic juice.
original: 1) 가지를 네 조각 내어 참기름에 굽는다. 2) 초와 마늘 즙에 담가 먹는다.
translated: 1) Cut the eggplant into four pieces and bake them in sesame oil. 2) Dip it in the vinegar and garlic juice.
